item.title: Adolescence star Owen Cooper becomes Emmys' youngest ever nominee
item.description: If he wins, Cooper will be the youngest male winner of an acting Emmy. See who are the others up for the TV industry's most prestigious awards.

item.title: Mike Waltz grilled over Signal leak at UN ambassador hearing
item.description: President Trump's former national security adviser was pressed on the inclusion of a journalist on a sensitive group chat discussing war plans.

item.title: Trump claims tariff deal with Indonesia
item.description: Trump says the US will lower its tariffs threatened on goods from Indonesia to 19% from a planned 32%.

item.title: Trump says Ukraine should not target Moscow
item.description: Trump asked Ukraine's Zelensky earlier this month if he could strike Moscow and other Russian targets, the Financial Times reported.

item.title: French PM looks to scrap two public holidays in bold bid to cut national debt
item.description: MPs will vote on Fran√ßois Bayrou's budget plan in the autumn, in a moment of high risk for the government.
